Reference

API usage and setup

default_ld_hubspot_app() hubspot_token_create() hubspot_token_get()

Create/retrieve Hubspot authorization token.

hubspot_key_get() hubspot_key_set()

Set/retrieve the Hubspot secret API key

hubspot_api_usage()

Check daily API usage

Data access

hs_deals_raw() hs_deals_tidy()

Deals endpoint (raw and tidy)

contact_properties()

Extract a table of contact IDs and simple property values

deal_pipeline_stages()

Extract a table of pipeline IDs and stages

deal_pipelines()

Extract a table of pipeline IDs and property values

hs_companies_raw() hs_companies_tidy()

Companies endpoint (raw and tidy)

get_company_properties()

Retrieve available properties for companies

get_contact_properties()

Retrieve available properties for contacts

get_contacts()

Get a list of all contacts, including a set of properties

get_deal_pipelines()

Retrieve available pipelines for deals

get_deal_properties()

Retrieve available properties for deals

get_owners()

Retrieve owners

owners()

Extract a table of CRM owners

Deprecated

hubspot-deprecated

Deprecated functions in hubspot
